plot: An ugly turkey, belittled by the other animals, grows up big and beautiful, and learns what it's like on the other side.
title: Ugly Turkey
plot_es: An ugly turkey, belittled by the other animals, grows up big and beautiful, and learns what it's like on the other side.
plot_en: An ugly turkey, belittled by the other animals, grows up big and beautiful, and learns what it's like on the other side.

produce.name: School of the Art Institute of Chicago, The
